title: Please upload your project brief
description: The project brief is required for the project to start.  Everyone will use this document.

title: Will any parts of the building / site be occupied during the works?
description: This is asked to ensure that any plans will take into account any members of the public who might be moving around the building / site.

title: Planned Start Date
description: This is asked to ensure that the project starts on schedule.

title: Planned End Date
description: This is asked to ensure that the project ends on schedule.

title: Will the project have any phasing requirements?
description: This is asked to ensure that any plans will take into account any phasing requirements.

title: Other Key Information
description: This can be key dates, key stakeholders, or any additional information about the project that the project team could find helpful.
